评论详情: I order this dress in green XXL and both times I've received the peach XS.  So while the product seems to be of good quality, when it's 6 sizes too small it's of no use to me.  Was really excited to wear this to a friends birthday...but after two tries I guess I'll be wearing something else.
Terrible quality not worth the price, you can find the same thing at your local flea market way cheaper!
Love that you can layer this over leggings and other shirts for cold weather or wear with shorts and sandals in summer.  Versatile piece!
El vestido fue enviado sin el cinturón

I love this dress. Perfect for Easter and got so many compliments on it. People were shocked when I told them it was from Amazon. Took the second wear for me to figure out how the belt worked, there’s a slit behind the front rooshing, but it looked great without it too.
Missing belt

These are beautiful dresses, made of cotton fabric.  I ordered size medium which fit me perfectly at 5’4”, 155 lbs, 36D bust.  The back is slightly longer than the front and they can be worn belted (included) or loose. They are great value for the price and I highly recommend them.
Material not as soft and flow not what I thought

Literally every time I wear this dress someone stops me and asks me where it’s from or how cute it is. Love that you can machine wash it, looks expensive and you can dress up or down. Fits true to size but to me, the sleeves are a little long so I have to fold up the cuffs, which have really nice button details.
Love this dress!  Great quality for the price.  True to size. Beautiful colors. 10/10

评论概述: It’s a NO for the busty girls
评论详情: The concept: great. Execution: meh. This was way too ill-fitting and weird across the chest (I am busty), when I thought this style would achieve the opposite of taking attention away from my chest. No such luck. Returned.
I wore this dress to a polo match and got several compliments. Everyone thought it was Zimmermann!  Very well made

This dress was so beautiful and made me feel so happy. I’m a pear shaped gal so finding clothes that are not too big and baggy looking or too tight and provocative looking can be a fine line. I needed a dress for my sister’s rehearsal dinner. Absolutely stunning. Would buy again and plan on keeping forever.
I felt like the bell of the ball.  I wore this in Las Vegas to see The Eagles in The Vegas sphere.  Best material, lined and stunning.  You’ll thank me later.
Classy Little dress. Details are amazing. Very flattering...

评论概述: Amazing quality and so many compliments!
评论详情: Was lucky enough to get this dress on sale and wear it for a day out in London. The dress is so unique it has a nice well-made material but it is on the thicker side. So definitely nothing for a hot day that you would want to wear. True size and the belt is adjustable. Considering getting it in more colors.
This dress is very great quality I love it! Very happy with my purchase

This dress looks great online but it is so big and the colors and fabric are misrepresented. It is very good quality though. The picture is a medium dress. I should need an extra small! Way too expensive for what I received.

评论概述: Colors are muted, fabric looks/feels cheap
评论详情: I bought the dress due to its vibrant color and it's style. As you can see in the photo, the colors are muted and dull. The fabric felt and looked cheap, while being heavy.  I wear 38DD/DDD and cannot fit into anything below M. I ordered a M and it was too loose.  I really wanted to like the dress, but will be returning.

Really like this dress and it’s heavier not cheap. Runs a little big I usually wear medium and exchanged for a small. Note I don’t have a large chest so if I did definitely would probably be true to size. I love the pockets, the print. My only complaint is that the button loops aren’t stretchy. So for the sleeves it’s super hard to get them button and they are tight. So I end up only buttoning the base and let the cuff flare out. I can tell the buttons will not stay and I’ll have to secure them better due to how you have to pull to get them secure. Other than that love this and got do many compliments on it
Quality is far from great. For summer dress fabrics is too thick. But looks great.
It was perfect
This dress was constructed for a smaller person.
I have not worn the dress out but I’ve tried it on and it’s beautiful

Fits a bit big, I sized down and had extra room, I did not dry with heat (that may help shrink it a little). It is well made and worth the money. Very chic, I wore to business retreat dinner.  The cotton is nice and breathable, I didn’t sweat outside in the sun with 85 degree temps. It is not sheer but I wore white/tan under garments.
Love this dress and the color. So many compliments. Paired it with shoes from Amazon. Shoes were super comfy

This dress is perfect for the occasion of vacation in tropical weather since I bought the paisley print in green & brown+yellow. It fits me well I had many compliments from everyone. I am 5 foot three inches & I weigh 160 pounds. The medium size fit nicely and I wore with three inch heels. I got many compliments from my more “In the know” fashionable friends & they even assumed this was a ZIMMERMAN dress! Although to some this dress may be expensive I thinks it’s totally worth it! I plan to buy my next one in white. Great dress overall !!!
Looks and feels expensive. Like that  there’s another thin white layer underneath. I would have to say, the dress is a bit short like others say. Would most likely wear biker shorts underneath.
Crooked seams, loose strings all over. Terrible fit
Cute summer dress. Love the material and the print! Fits TTS

The dress is super high quality. Fabric is thick and the design is embroidered in. Very high quality and felt like a $90 dress (what I paid for it), not like the typical cheap fabric that is typical of quick-fashion, Amazon clothes.  Ended up returning it because it was very orange, I wanted more pink. But it was very cute but just not the color I wanted. In the picture, I'm like a 115 lbs and 5'4" and am wearing the XS. I did have to tighten the pink sash around the waist very tight. It would have been significantly too big without being able to tighten the waist.

When I received the dress, I opened it immediately and fell in love because it is absolutely beautiful. Gorgeous dress. I will unfortunately be running the dress.  I am 5 feet 135 lbs And because the dress is so wide-sleeved and puffy skirt, it makes me look huge. So I’m going to give the dress five stars. It’s just not meant for my body type. So that has nothing to do with the product. Love the pockets!!! In had no clue until I tried it. Amazing dress. So well made good quality fabric yet  light and airy fit.

This dress is literally a Zimmerman dupe. Quality is the same as my $1000 Zimmermans. I’m 5’8”, 150 lbs and got an xl for the length. Luckily looks great oversized and able to tie the string in the back to get the fitted look in the front. It hits me mid thigh, slightly shorter than I would like as other reviews have mentioned but not uncomfortable. Just a length I need to be mindful of with sitting down with how flowy it is. For reference, I ordered the green and yellow paisley dress. High collar doesn’t lay as structured as illustrated in the photo but fixed that with some heavy starch spray and an iron.
Love how it looks and very well made.

评论概述: Neckline, buttons and fabric are too much!
评论详情: Super cute print but he dress drowns a petite person. The neckline and buttons were excessive.
feels its too much fabric used
Beautiful great Quality got a lot of compliments

I really wanted this dress but was so disappointed ay how puffy it was on the bottom. It had way to much fabric and made my behind look larger. Returned.  I did by the green/ yellow version and absolutely love it.
El color es espectacular, la talla es ideal lo retorne por que no va con mi estilo
I wore this for a friends baby shower and my baby’s dedication. It was perfect! Great quality. So worth it.

评论概述: Meh, entirely too big in all the wrong places
评论详情: I purchased this dress after seeing an IG influencer rave about it. Sadly, it's just too big all over and not flattering at all.
So cute,so well made,so many compliments….not the easiest to button but that would be my only complaint. It’s definitely a statement piece
It did not complement my body shape. But it is a beautiful quality material. And that’s why it cost so much.
Fresh fabric and elegant, ideal for summer.

评论概述: The underslip and belt was missing from my package.
评论详情: This is the 2nd time I have bought this dress. The 1st time was the all white version and I loved it so much I ordered the green. This dress was missing the underslip and the tie belt that should come with it. The belt can be seen in the pic and I have purchased this item in another color before.. I love the dress and I just really wish they had included the belt.

I love the colors and the pattern, but the dress does run a tad short. I am ordering a half slip to wear under it and give me a little more length--especially when the belt is added. I get a lot of compliments. I am 5'5" 133 lbs and 34DD... the Medium fits great!

评论概述: More like a shirt than dress
评论详情: I really wanted this dress to work out. It looked like the perfect spring dress. Unfortunately, it fitted me more like a shirt than a dress. Would be better for someone with a smaller chest.
This dress is super flattering and well made, will use for my bachelorette

I wanted this dress to work so badly, however, the fit was atrocious. If you’re a curvier girl like me this is not the dress for you. Far too tight in the chest, way too much fabric in the skirt. Looks stupid belted with the included belt.

评论概述: Cutest dress I’ve seen in a while…
评论详情: Runs narrow and was too tight in my chest, otherwise an adorable dress and for me perfect elsewhere. The colors are great!
Omg I absolutely loved it!!! I plan on ordering it in white and tan too!!!

Edit after original post: I decided to return it. I SO wanted to keep it because it’s adorable. Sadly I just couldn’t make it work.  This dress (?) is adorable. It’s so beautiful and the quality is very nice. It definitely gives Free People/Anthro vibes. After reading the reviews carefully I came away with the consensus that it’s short. Perhaps a little too short for probably 90% of us. I ordered it anyways hoping that on my 5’3” frame that it may , fingers crossed, work. Well it didn’t. At least not as a dress. I adore this “dress” (I hesitate calling it a dress because generally speaking, it’s missing half of it) so much though, that I’m going to keep it and wear it with cropped denim bottoms and wear it as a tunic/babydoll top and pair it with a cute summery clutch, metallic sandals and statement earrings. If you can rock it as a dress- you go sister- more power to you! But if you can’t, no need to fret, wear it as a baby doll top and still rock it!
The gorgeous buttons and embroidery with soft slip liner make this my fave Spring dress

This arrived 6 days after it showed it had, arrived in a plastic mailer bag wadded up, unbuttoned, liner slip in a ball wad, the rope belt was hanging on one side other side was torn loose, it was horrible and it is also very very tiny. not a good purchase, did return but I must say, THIS DRESS I RECEIVED HAD BEEN WORN WITHOUT A DOUBT.
Very pretty dress and great quality fabric. Looks like it came from Anthropologie. A little too short for myself (5’9) but works for my daughter (5’7).

I’m a huge fan of Zimmerman dresses and this is a great dress that’s similar. The quality is that of a Zimmerman dress. The pictures on Amazon don’t do it justice. It’s sort of a heavy linen feel, the eyelets are brocade, the colors are absolutely beautiful. I ordered a large, I probably could go to a medium, but I’ll probably wear it with some fun espadrilles. I can’t wait!! Absolutely buy this dress! You won’t be sorry!

评论概述: The fabric and details on this dress are amazing !  It looks like it could be a Zimmerman dress!
评论详情: I absolutely love this dress! The fabric is amazing. The detailing is perfect. It has pockets and looks great with boots or heels. Definitely  looks like a Zimmerman dress.

I got my usual size and shouldn't have. It was too big. I am normally a small and will return it. The fabric is very nice quality. The style is pretty and the details are delightful. no liner. I got the green print. I would buy again but in XSmall.
I’m 6’ and it barely covered my crotch. Looked ridiculous. But would be cute for the shorties!
Great quality and my friends… It has pockets! Love it.
Terrible quality of the dresses plus I ordered both black and white and requested a return I mailed both together and got a refund for only one.
Complete Zimmerman dupe, beautiful button detailing with functional buttons you so can customize the neckline. Get one while you can.
It is super flattering and really fun to wear!
It was perfect. Definitely short. Especially if you are on the curvier side and have some back. Still turned pretty cute.
I liked this dress a lot, pretty true to size, just a tad small. However, if I would have gone up it may have been too big
Really like it. Good quality. Looks beautiful
The most of beautiful dress for the summer!

This dress is so cute and I received many compliments! I opted not to belt it and went for a more casual look with boots. This would be great for maternity without the belt. The look changes significantly with a belt, and is still super cute. Comes with a slip that is high quality

评论概述: Terrific and Well Worth the Wait
评论详情: This dress took over a month but it was worth the wait. The pattern is beautiful and the dress is very flattering.
Very nice dress! Perfect material & details. Gorgeous sleeves and perfect length! But extremely big! Like two sizes big. Recommend the dress but go one or two sizes down, you won’t regretted
